list.en: I lost my job yesterday.
I have an interview tomorrow morning.
Are you looking for a job?
What are you planning to do next?
I'll try some foreign trade companies.
I have waited for a week but still have no response.
list.cn: 我已经等了一个星期了，但仍然没有回音。

list.en: What kind of people do you need?
Is there anything I can do?
I'm looking for a part time job.
Are there any vacancies in your company?
list.cn: 你们公司有空缺职位吗?

list.en: Have you got a job for a secretary?
May I have your name?
Do you have a good command of English?
You're applying for the position of manager, aren't you?
list.cn: 你在申请经理的职位，是吗?

list.en: Can you tell me something about the position?
list.cn: 你能告诉我有关这个职位的情况吗?

list.en: I'm here for an interview, as requested.
I think you'd be the perfect person for the job.
list.cn: 我觉得你是这份工作的最佳人选。

list.en: What kind of benefits do you have for your employees?
list.cn: 你们为员工提供什么样的福利?

list.en: Could you tell me about some jobs you've had in the past?
list.cn: 你能说说你过去做过的工作吗?

list.en: Do you drive yourself to work?
Is this your first job?
list.cn: 这是你的第一份工作吗?

list.en: What is your history as far as jobs are concerned?
As far as work ethic goes, where do you stand?
list.cn: 就职业道德而言，你的立场是什么?

list.en: Would you consider yourself to have a good work ethic?
list.cn: 你认为自己有良好的职业道德吗?

list.en: How do you handle your conflict with your colleagues in your work?
list.cn: 你如何处理与同事在工作中的矛盾?

list.en: What kind of job have you had?
Why did you choose this company?
How long have you worked there?
How long is a trial period?
How about the work hours?
Do you often work overtime?
What shoes should I wear? Do I need to buy a new tie?
list.cn: 我该穿什么鞋?我需要买条新领带吗?

list.en: Don't paint on the makeup.
Your nail should be clean.
Can you tell me how should I wear?
list.cn: 你能告诉我该怎么穿吗?

list.en: Never go without hosiery and don't wear sandals.
list.cn: 出门一定要穿袜子，也不要穿凉鞋。

list.en: Pay attention to your hair.
Which day is payday?
You can get your salary on fifth of each month.
What's your expected salary?
Do you have a paid vacation?
For women, we have a maternity leave.
We won't pay in sick days.
I'd like to know something about the benefits.
list.cn: 我想知道一些关于福利的事情。

list.en: Would you please tell me about the insurance?
list.cn: 请告诉我有关保险的情况好吗?

list.en: May I ask about the pay?
The bonus is paid by year.
What's your hobby?
What kind of character do you think you have?
list.cn: 你认为你是什么样的人?

list.en: Are you introverted or extroverted?
What kind of person would you like to work with?
list.cn: 你喜欢和什么样的人一起工作?

list.en: How do you get along with others?
list.cn: 你和别人相处得怎么样?

list.en: What basic principles do you apply to your life?
list.cn: 你生活中的基本原则是什么?

list.en: How do you spend your spare time?
list.cn: 你怎样度过你的业余时间?

list.en: I'm an outgoing girl.
What kind of sports do you like the most?
What are your hobbies?
I'm an easy going person.
list.cn: 我是一个容易相处的人。

list.en: I'm keen on climbing.
I have an interest in traveling.
I like to be alone.
Do you have work experience?
What is your past job experience?
list.cn: 你过去的工作经验是什么?

list.en: I have some practical experience.
What work were you responsible for at your previous work unit?
list.cn: 你在以前的单位负责什么工作?

list.en: What have you learned from jobs you have held?
list.cn: 你从以前的工作中学到了什么?

list.en: What position have you had before?
Have you worked in a school?
I have no experience in work, but eager to learn.
list.cn: 我没有工作经验，但渴望学习。

list.en: Have you done some part time work?
How many employer have you worked for?
Can you give me a general description of your former work?
list.cn: 你能笼统地描述一下你以前的工作吗?

list.en: What's your last job?
Do you have any sales experience?
I am sorry to say that I have no experience in this field.
list.cn: 很抱歉，我在这方面没有经验。

list.en: What's your education background?
I'm with a master's degree.
Which school are you studying?
Which school are you studying in now?
list.cn: 你现在在哪个学校学习?

list.en: What's your major?
I'm specializing in business administration.
I heard you're a junior college student.
list.cn: 我听说你是一名大专学生。

list.en: What's your educational background?
What were your grades in college?
I graduated from qinghua university.
I got a degree in international trade.
list.cn: 我获得了国际贸易的学位。

list.en: What do you expect to get from this job?
list.cn: 你希望从这份工作中得到什么?

list.en: What are your long term career goals?
list.cn: 你的长期职业目标是什么?

list.en: Where would you like to be in three years?
list.cn: 三年后你想达到什么水平?

list.en: How do you think of this industry Outlook in two years?
list.cn: 你认为两年后这个行业的前景如何?

list.en: How can you try to gain your success?
What type of job do you want?
What would you want to be responsible for?
What type of team would you want?
What kind of hours would you want to work?
list.cn: 你希望在什么时间工作?

list.en: What sort of culture would you want the company have?
list.cn: 你希望公司有什么样的文化?

list.en: I expect to begin with the secretary.
Is there any chance to get promotion?
What kind of person do you think you are?
list.cn: 你认为你是什么样的人?

list.en: What do you consider your major strength?
list.cn: 你认为你的主要优点是什么?

list.en: What's your weak point weakness?
We need a person with ability plus flexibility.
list.cn: 我们需要有能力及适应力强的人。

list.en: I'm willing to work under pressure with leadership quality.
list.cn: 我愿意在压力下工作，并具领导素质。

list.en: I'm an energetic, fashion minded person.
list.cn: 我是一个精力充沛、有时尚头脑的人。

list.en: I think I'm highly organized and efficient.
list.cn: 我认为我做事很有条理，效率很高。

list.en: I'm equipped with the ability to deal with personnel at all levels effectively.
list.cn: 我具备与各种人员打交道的能力。

list.en: I'm a little irritable.
I have no good and extensive social connections.
list.cn: 我没有良好而广泛的社会关系。

list.en: I don't have good analytical capability.
list.cn: 我没有很好的分析能力。

list.en: You don't possess good presentation skills.
list.cn: 你没有很好的表达技巧。

list.en: How many languages can you speak?
Are you good at English?
I have passed C E T six.
list.cn: 我已经通过了cet六级考试。

list.en: I passed bec business English certificate last year.
list.cn: 我去年通过了商务英语证书。

list.en: I majored in Japanese in university.
My foreign language at college is Russian.
list.cn: 我在大学的外语是俄语。

list.en: My score on tele is 658.
I got a high score on g.
A major is foreign trade, English.
My major is foreign trade, English minor in Japanese.
list.cn: 我的专业是外贸，英语辅修日语。

list.en: I can speak Korean a little.
I can speak English fluently.
I once worked as an English interpreter in a big foreign company.
list.cn: 我曾经在一家大外企做过英语翻译。

list.en: I can speak three foreign languages.
You speak English well.
Why do you have an interest in applying our firm?
list.cn: 你为什么对我们公司感兴趣?

list.en: Why are you interested in our company in particular?
list.cn: 你为什么对我们公司特别感兴趣?

list.en: Why are you eager to get this job?
list.cn: 你为什么渴望得到这份工作?

list.en: What has prompted you to apply for this position?
list.cn: 是什么促使你申请这个职位?

list.en: Why did you decide to seek a position in this company?
list.cn: 你为什么决定来本公司找工作?

list.en: What's the reason for your application for this position?
list.cn: 你申请这个职位的原因是什么?

list.en: Why are you leaving your present job?
list.cn: 你为什么要离开现在的工作?

list.en: I see no chance of advancement.
list.cn: 我看不出有升迁的机会。

list.en: I'm keen to take more responsibilities.
list.cn: 我渴望承担更多的责任。

list.en: I think I'm qualified for this position.
list.cn: 我认为我能胜任这个职位。

list.en: When can I know your decision?
list.cn: 我什么时候能知道你的决定?

list.en: Do I need the second interview?
Do you have any questions?
We give you our decision in a few days.
list.cn: 我们会在几天内通知你我们的决定。

list.en: I expect to hear from you as soon as possible.
list.cn: 我希望能尽快收到你的消息。

list.en: Thank you for your interest in our company.
list.cn: 谢谢你来我们公司面试。

list.en: Would you please let the next applicant come in on your way out?
list.cn: 你出去的时候能让下一个应聘者进来吗?

list.en: Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to interview me.
list.cn: 感谢您在百忙之中抽出时间来面试我。

list.en: How can we get in touch with you?
list.cn: 我们怎样才能和你取得联系?

list.en: Any other questions?
